mainEntity.name: What is the difference between hybrid and all-in Cloudflare architecture?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Hybrid architecture: Uses Cloudflare for CDN, security, and static assets while maintaining proprietary servers for core logic. Example: Discord (80-90% edge) keeps WebSocket servers proprietary for real-time chat.
                                    All-in architecture: Runs the entire platform on Cloudflare Workers. Example: Shopify achieves 100% edge delivery with complete platform execution on Workers.

mainEntity.name: Does Shopify run entirely on Cloudflare?

acceptedAnswer.text: Shopify uses Cloudflare for storefront acceleration and security, achieving 70-80% edge delivery for user-facing traffic. However, core e-commerce logic and order processing remain on Shopify's proprietary infrastructure.
